title: Season 8
body: why cant we gain BE when a game is over and what about the honor rewards

replies.body: The ways you get blue essence haven't changed, and you never got BE after matches before. You can still get some from chest/capsules which you get much more of since you can get one on levelups, and you can still disenchant shards for essence as well.

I think he was talking about why we can't get BE after games like we did IP before. Everyone thinks of them as the same thing because of the merge of the two. Me and a fair amount of my friends who play league are all really frustrated with how hard it feels like it is to get champs now because it takes forever to level up, and once you do you don't really get much BE for it. It doesn't really feel like every game you play you're making progress towards your next champion.
